metadata.name: Analyze DB API Fit
metadata.shortDescription: Analyze functional spec + OpenAPI against existing database schemas to identify data gaps and integration risks for microservices.
metadata.description: Extract data requirements from a functional specification and OpenAPI contract, request/ingest existing DB artifacts (DDL/migrations/ERD), and produce a structured DB â†” API fit analysis including field-level mappings, missing data gaps, and decisions needed to implement business logic without changing the database.
objectives: Extract a data-requirements inventory from functional spec and OpenAPI
Propose candidate microservice boundaries and data ownership assumptions
Map required domain data to existing DB schema artifacts
Identify gaps, risks, and decisions needed to implement the API
Produce a reusable report suitable for stakeholders
